title: Why does my HUAWEI MediaPad 7 Youth 2 constantly crash?
answer:
If you install applications that have not passed the Google compatibility test on your HUAWEI MediaPad 7 Youth 2, the system may be unstable or even crash.

It is recommended that you download applications only from the Play Store.

If your HUAWEI MediaPad 7 Youth 2 is experiencing frequent crashes, perform a hard restart by pressing and holding the power button for about 10 seconds.
